text: Chipiriso chake chakanga chiri chendiro yesirivha yairema mashekeri zana namakumi matatu7:13 zvichienda mberi muchitsauku chino, makirogiramu angaita 1.5 , uye mbiya imwe chete yokusasa yesirivha yairema mashekeri makumi manomwe7:13 zvichienda mberi muchitsauku chino, 0.8 yekirogiramu , zvose zviri zviviri maererano neshekeri renzvimbo tsvene, rimwe nerimwe rizere noupfu hwakatsetseka hwakavhenganiswa namafuta sechipiriso chezviyo;
